You should write a @Rule that will intercept the Description associated
wit=
h the current test case and store it somewhere (or use it directly).
Check =
out the javadoc for @Rule.

http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/javadoc/latest=
/org/junit/rules/TestRule.html


Dawid

yne <wdtj@...> wrote:

ent.

ep a log

ion class in the runner. Is there any way to
